programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are You Really My Mom?; Is the Real Issue Our Mother?
programme.desc: Wisdom and her cousin Brendon were the best of friends until they got into a physical altercation; Kristina and her husband, Mike, reconciled their differences after being separated, then she learned that he got another woman pregnant.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: You Left and Deny Your Children; Mom ... Stop Loving Them, Just Love Us
programme.desc: Cody says ex-girlfriend Brittany is a liar and a cheater who can't be trusted; Anisty wants her mother, Sharetta, to own up to her toxic ways once and for all.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Messy Family Drama / Unlock The Truth: Did You Steal My Money?
programme.desc: Markeila says that Darrell abandoned her while she was 6 months pregnant with her daughter. He relocated to another state and had a child with another woman! Plus, Chloe says her Aunt Sabrena is a thief who stole her food stamp card.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Plus Size Model Confronts Her Online Troll
programme.desc: Shawntel is fed up with her ex-friend Christian fat shaming her on social media! He says it's tough love.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Internet Rejects Our Open Adoption!
programme.desc: Ashley and Steven want to adopt another child, but Ashley’s mother wants her to try and carry a child herself.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Stop Blaming Us for Dad's Death
programme.desc: Since the devastating loss of her husband, Anita’s relationship with her daughters has been splintered.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: 42 Years Later; My Ex-BFF Wants to Be Me
programme.desc: Denise fears that her out-of-control daughter will wind up incarcerated or dead; Melanie spoiled her fiancé, Dakota, with all kinds of lavish gifts, but now she thinks he's cheating and has called off their engagement until Karamo unlocks his phone.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Fiancé Sleep With My Uncle for Money?
programme.desc: Did Ray cheat on Ashley while she was pregnant with his baby and have a secret threesome? Then, is Jason’s fiancé Tasha sleeping with his own uncle Sonny for money? You won’t believe the crazy reveals today!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Results Are In...Are These 3 Kids Mine?
programme.desc: Takeea previously brought fiancé Brent here to prove his fidelity. Now they’re back so she can prove her fidelity and her child’s paternity! Then, Maryanne’s fiancé Dooger denies their 3 kids, but who will be right after the test results come out?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Baby ... 4 Men Tested ... Who's The Father?
programme.desc: First, Megan is back for the 3rd time to give more paternity tests. After learning neither Michael nor David was the father on her first 2 appearances, can Kayton, Megan's fiance, or Shawn be the man who ends her search today?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Paternity and Cheating Teen Couples in Crisis
programme.desc: Ariel decided to have a baby with Justin, the love of her life. But then Justin left when she was 4 months pregnant. Then 16 year old Arthur takes pride in his controlling behavior towards his girlfriend, Tashma.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Husband Sleeping with My Best Friend?
programme.desc: Chris admits to past infidelity, but Melissa forgave him. She suspects Chris is again cheating after finding suspicious stains on his clothing and strange women's underwear in the house. Is Chris two-timing Melissa again?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Husband Sleep With My Sister-In-Law ... Test Them!
programme.desc: Barbara says that her fiance is looking for her to get frisky in the bedroom. But is he learning new moves from another woman? Then, Did Angela's husband really sleep with her future sister-in-law?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Test Him! Is My Man Cheating For Money and Gifts?
programme.desc: Today on Maury ... its cheating lovers exposed! When the trust is broken in their relationships, can these couples ever recover? These couples are at their wits end because they're convinced that one partner is cheating. But Maury's going to break through all the lies and get to the truth! What will the lie detector results reveal? Will these couples ever be the same? Find out on today's MAURYI

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did Our Babysitter Have A Baby With My 14 Year Old Son?
programme.desc: Amy hired Jessica to babysit their 14-year old son and 3 years later, Jessica claims the son is the father.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Found A Prostitute In Our House...Did You Cheat?
programme.desc: ShaToya is convinced Tyronn is cheating on her. She even found his "secret cell phone" that Tyronn uses to talk to other women. Tyronn says he doesn't cheat and ShaToya is overreacting.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Six Babies ... Six Angry Moms ... Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: Kimberly is nineteen and she's not sure which of these two men is the father. Then, Nicole and her baby have been left to sleep on her friends couch because the father is unwilling to help.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 5 Women ... 6 Babies Tested ... Who's the Dad
programme.desc: John denies both of Misty's kids, but Misty and John's mother Rhoda are here to make him step up. Then, Frank and his mother are here to find out if his wife cheated with 18 other men, and whether or not Frank is the father of her child.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Unfriending A Friend
programme.desc: Maxine Span says she and the defendant have been good friend forever and she is shocked and appalled to be here in court with her, but what’s right is right, she loaned her 240 bucks. The defendant, Sherise Dunlap, says the plaintiff told her the money she gave her was a gift, then turns around and changes her tune saying it was a loan. Her son even threatened her! She called the cops and is sticking to her guns saying the money was a gift. She is accused of un-friending a friend.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: My Brother Stole My TV
programme.desc: Natheefa sues her brother Clifford, accusing him of stealing her 55" TV and owing $4,750 in rent after abruptly moving out. Clifford claims he left due to household tensions and took his own belongings.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Rental Ruckus
programme.desc: Bruce Pouncy claims his landlord, Beatrice Smith, forced him out and kept his $1,200 deposit after he suggested a new roommate. Beatrice says Bruce left the apartment a mess, removed the oven door, and didn’t pay rent.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Riot Over the Internet
programme.desc: Christopher Shaw sues tenant La'Shaunda Harris for $700, accusing her of being a professional rent scammer. La'Shaunda countersues for $657.65, claiming he’s a terrible landlord.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Repair Bill Riot
programme.desc: Plaintiffs Susan and Anthony claim Kim owes $744 for car repairs after paying only $56 due to a clerical error. Kim argues she paid the billed amount and was misled by the plaintiffs. Both sides accuse each other of taking advantage.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Stop Gaslighting Me and Unlock Your Phone
programme.desc: Quandra believes that her sister Deidra’s fiancé Jamar, is a cheating and manipulative liar!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Families Reunited
programme.desc: Jelli and her sister have been feuding over a business transaction gone awry, just one of multiple issues!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Hate My Sister’s Husband / Unlock The Phone: Prove You're Innocent
programme.desc: James hopes to rekindle a fractured relationship with his sister. Things went off the hinges years ago.
